solution_line_template: Mrs. Lacson sold a total of {sold_to_mrs_adams} + {sold_to_mr_lenon} = <<{sold_to_mrs_adams}+{sold_to_mr_lenon}={total_sold}>>{total_sold} sweet potatoes.
Hence, there are still {total_harvested} - {total_sold} = <<{total_harvested}-{total_sold}={not_yet_sold}>>{not_yet_sold} sweet potatoes left unsold.
